comment: Dr. Sanchez was knowledgeable in the subject area and guided group discussions. Her research knowledge was a plus to the class. This was an in-person class, that should be structured as an online course. A lot of reading nd coursework, so don't get behind.

Professor Sanchez was an amazing professor. She really cares about mental health, and made my first education class very fun. She likes to go on tangents though, and doesn't grade until the end of the semester. She has a hard time responding to emails. I recommend going to office hours if you have questions. Course has modules due every weekend.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Dr. Sanchez gives you time to be flexible in the class and share what you have learned in the teaching field. If you try to take advantage of the grading situation and let the work pile up, then you are going to be in for a surprise when it is ALL due at the end of the semester. She literally cares about her students and will go to bat for you.

Dr. Sanchez is a great person, but her class is very disorganized. Half the time, it's confusing what is supposed to be going on. Most of the learning is done on your own or outside of class. She's really nice and lenient on grading and due dates, but you won't learn much unless you put the effort in yourself.

I felt like we never did anything in class. She would teach and then would assign homework problems, then we were given literally two weeks to do the same 10 homework problems with our groups. Assignments were constantly rearranged and nothing felt organized. Class felt like a waste of time doing the same problems for weeks learning nothing.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Sanchez is amazing! She makes learning about fractions really easy and is willing to help if you are struggling. She gives you plenty of time to go over the material. Make sure you pay attention in class to learn the different methods and you will get an A.

Professor Sanchez has a lot of bad rates but she is amazing! Her class is so easy and she lets you out early almost every time. She's very caring and will do almost anything to help you understand the content. There is homework due every class but it's simple and so are the tests. I would take her again if I could!

Great teacher who's willing to help. She cares about her students m. If you show her you're trying she gives her all to you to help you pass. Don't miss class because it's easy to fall behind. Tests are just like the study guides.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Caring

comment: She seems to  know alot about Mathematics. The class was easy but it seems like she assigns work for the fun of it. She does not grade work on a consistent basis so basically you are in the class all semester but have no idea how you are actually doing. She is a nice person but I would never take her class again unless she was the only person teaching it.
Very confusing. Many times late and not prepared for class. Do not recommend this professor.

Wow, I am really shocked to see these reviews. I thought she was great. I think you have to have a good foundation in 2008, which it seems many did not for whatever reason. Overall, she was always willing to meet and help students. I thought she was very kind.

Nice lady . .but a HORRIBLE teacher!  We didn't even get through all of the content required in this course.  She confuses herself constantly.  If you are not good in math . . stay away!!  The entire class was frustrated the entire semester.
Silly point system!! Class is very boring. Dr. Sanchez is nice but talks a lot about math and doesn't do much teaching it. She is not good at responding to emails.

Very unorganized, very slow pace yet I wasn't learning anything. She doesn't really teach she lets everyone else come to the board to do problems. She only gives participation points if you talk constantly. She gets off task and so does the rest of the class because of that. Very frustrated that I paid for this course!!!!
